attributes.action: Stop donating money to foreign nations when it would be better spent combating our own nations problems.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: £30 million pedged to help Palestine shows that our nations cares and is willing to help other lesser well off nations. But our own country has many problems that £30 million would help combat. Knife crime is high on everyones list of growing concern is this fine nation. Would it not be better to fight this growing threat to our way of life. I myself am very wary walking down my own nations streets. THIS SHOULD NOT BE THE CASE! Lets sort out our own problems before we try and sort out others.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
